Text: Hello JeffreyDear Jeffrey We recently have left various voice maiIs with different individuals within Enron and I wanted to follow up with you regarding how we are helping other companies leverage their Web sites to drive more revenue and acquire high quality leads WHO ARE WE NewChannel is a web based sales productivity solution Our patent pending Qualification Engine enables businesses to qualify contact and initiate sales cycles faster capturing opportunities while quality prospects are on their website Companies such as GE Dell Peoplesoft and ATT are utilizing the NewChannel solution to increase revenues A few of the benefits Increased pipeline by up to Xs in days using NewChannel Shortened the sales cycle and increased closure rate by by prioritizing qualified prospects Track monitor and enhance marketing programs that drive visitors to your website Initiate contact with your web visitors before they visit your competitors site Click here to learn more solutionssolutionshtml No company has too much business not to learn more about NewChannel What would you recommend to be the best way to arrange time for a minute conversation to discuss how NewChannel can assist Enronin driving ADDITIONAL REVENUE Is there anyone else within your organization that should be contacted regarding lead generation and sales productivity Jeffrey I look forward to speaking with you soon I can be contacted at the numbers listed below otherwise I will follow up with you next week Respectfully Cary Bushfield Cahners White Paperpdfpdf Cary Bushfield Sales Development Associate NewChannel Inc Convention Wy Redwood City CA d f wwwnewchannelcom Cahners White Paperpdfpdf
